parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Balloon style as defined in swBalloonStyle_e

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Balloon size as defined in swBalloonFit_e

parameters.name: UpperTextStyle
parameters.description: Style for the upper text of the balloon as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e

parameters.name: UpperText
parameters.description: Style for the upper text of the balloon as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e

parameters.name: LowerTextStyle
parameters.description: Upper text in the balloon

parameters.name: LowerText
parameters.description: Upper text in the balloon

parameters.name: CustomSize
parameters.description: Style for the lower text of the balloon as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e ; valid for balloons only and Style must be set to swBS_SplitCirc

parameters.name: ShowQuantity
parameters.description: Style for the lower text of the balloon as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e ; valid for balloons only and Style must be set to swBS_SplitCirc

parameters.name: QuantityPlacement
parameters.description: Lower text in the balloon; valid for balloons only and Style must be set to swBS_SplitCirc

parameters.name: QuantityDenotationText
parameters.description: User-defined size of the balloon; Size must be set to swBF_UserDef
